title: "Neon Metropolis"
content:
# Welcome to Neon Metropolis

Neon Metropolis is a website that showcases the latest in futuristic cityscapes, featuring stunning graphics and mesmerizing neon lights. Our collection of wallpapers captures the essence of what it means to live in a bustling metropolis with a modern twist.

Our website is perfect for anyone who loves the urban lifestyle and wants to bring a piece of it into their home or office. With our dark and moody color scheme, you can create a sophisticated atmosphere that is both stylish and contemporary.

Whether you're looking for inspiration for your next project or just want to add some flair to your desktop background, Neon Metropolis has something for everyone. Browse our collection today and discover the beauty of the future cityscape.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A minimalist graphic of a futuristic cityscape, with glowing neon lights and a dark and moody color scheme."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
